aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.intro: Hi, I’m Daniel — a full-stack developer passionate about clean code, scalable architectures, and clear interfaces. What excites me most is when frontend and backend come together seamlessly to turn an idea into a smooth user experience.

highlights.location: From Seligenstadt, Germany — I enjoy working remotely and in international teams.
highlights.mindset: Curious and growth-oriented — I explore new technologies every sprint and share my insights with the team.
highlights.problem: Analytical problem-solver — I break challenges into testable steps, measure results, and iterate toward the best solution.

skills.title: Skill Set
skills.description: An overview of my skills. I work with modern frontend and backend technologies, focusing on clean, scalable code. Continuous learning is part of my workflow — I stay flexible and adapt quickly to new developments.

cta.title: Missing
cta.text: Feel free to reach out. I’m always expanding my knowledge and learning new technologies with purpose.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.lead: Explore a selection of my work here – interact with projects to see my skills in action.

pokedex.title: Pokedex
pokedex.subtitle: API-based Pokédex
pokedex.description: A responsive Pokédex powered by the PokéAPI. Search, filter, and explore Pokémon stats with smooth animations and offline caching.

goblinSlayer.title: Goblin Slayer
goblinSlayer.subtitle: Jump ’n’ Run Web Game
goblinSlayer.description: A fully JavaScript-built browser game with custom design, combat mechanics, and modular enemy AI. Built on a component-based architecture and optimized for smooth performance.

heinze.name: S. Heinze
heinze.text: Collaborating with Daniel means always getting more than expected — his creativity finds its way into every detail.

problem.title: Looking for a developer?
problem.description: I help teams and projects with clean code, solid architecture, and a strong focus on user experience. If you’re looking for a reliable full-stack developer who brings ideas to life — let’s talk.
